BUiM Group enables businesses to exchange ideas,

procedures to ensure the effectiveness of business
- Represent company at trade association meeting to
promote products

Marketing Manager
Eligraphics is the first world-class animation studio in
Vietnam. We started out as a service company. Since 2013,
Eligraphics has shifted focus to producingour own IP -
‘Planet Z’ and ‘Eli Kids’, targeting traditional media as well as
digitalplatforms, with the financial backing of Elinext Group.

POPS WorldWide [April 2016 - May 2017]
Community & Media Executive
POPS Worldwide is the leading digital entertainment
company in Southeast Asia with operations. The POPS
Network works with over 1,500 content partners from all over
the world. The top digital stars, musicians, production
companies, TV broadcasters and content owners have made
POPS Worldwide their partner of choice.
Community & Media Executive has responsibilies to
contribute a community for POPS Audience on social
network in order to viral theirs digital products
- Manage FB Fanpages, Google Plus Page, Zalo Page, IG
Page

- Plan and Report Ad - hoc Campaign

- Report Violent Contents/ Trademask

Network.
YAN Live [April 2013 - August 2014]
Event Staff
YAN Live is the international and local expert eventers as
well as network of not only local but also international artists,
has organized successfully more than 50 diversified
entertainment events, ranging from corporate events, music
concert, themed parties indoor and outdoor to launch events
of leading brands. 
- Manage and support artists before and during events
- Supervison backstage area
- Support team to manage sound equipment
- Recruit and manage volunteers for event
Goal: Knowledge about backstage and event operation skill
YAN TV [Dec 2014 - Mar 2015]
Social Media Executive
YAN TV - The leading youth channel. YAN TV was officially
launched in Jun 2009. It currently reaches over 5 million
household in all major cities and provinces nationwide.
YANTV's overall platform combines on-air, online, mobile and
on-the-ground elements.
- Manage Fanpage and Create Content for YANTV, YAN
NEWS, Bí Kíp Yêu 
- Report Weekly Performance of Page for Leader
Goal: Fanpage Management
